mng: to grow, to plant, to insert, to force on sb, to fall head first

exm.mng: to grow, to cultivate, to train, to educate, to patronize
growing plants in pots, Japanese: bonsai
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to fall head over heels, (fig.) to come a cropper
to enjoy the benefits of the hard work of one's predecessors. (idiom)
exm.pyn: qián rén zāi shù , hòu rén chéng liáng

exm.mng: to fall headlong, fig. a disastrous setback
talk nicely and avoid disputes, give compliments and not remarks
exm.pyn: duō zāi huā shǎo zāi cì
